WorkItem.Description:
The below items selected by the the indicated filters need to be updated. This list only considers location and ilvl of items (it does not consider if the items have the correct stats):
 
 
59340 "Breastplate of Avenging Flame" is listed as dropping from Chimaeron but should show as dropping from Magmaw
59329 "Parasitic Bands" is listed as dropping from Chimaeron but should show as dropping from Magmaw
59313 "Brackish Gloves" is listed as dropping from Toxitron but should show as dropping from Chimaeron
 
All the various tier 11.0 helms should show as Nefarian instead of their current varied locations.

All the various tier 11.5 legs should show as Heroic Maloriak instead of their current varied locations.

The following 372 version of trash drops are in the itemcache with varied locations but to not exist in game:
65009, 65010, 65011, 65012, 65014,

Comments.Message: Are these same issues occurring after Reset Item Cache?
These are with a fresh SVN co and build of the WPF version of Rawr  I.E. with the latest version of ItemCache.xml as of snv rev 58411.
